charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE, COCAINE (Ct 1: $2 MIL - 5 to 40 years; 4 years Supervised Release; S/A: $50.00)(1)
21:842 ATTEMPT TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE A SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE, COCAINE (CT 1: 1 MIL - 20 years; 5 years Supervised Release; S/A: $50.00)(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant remanded for 41 months; to surrender at 9:00 on 01-06-92 at the Count Jail; upon release Defendant placed on 5 years Supervised Release with the conditions that Defendant follow the rules and regulations of the Probation Department, serve 2 50 hours of community service with an agency and on a schedule agreed upon by the Defendant and the Probation Department, submit to random urinalysis, not possess a firearm or destructive device, and obtain and maintain employment.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B)(ii) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE A SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE IN EXCESS OF 500 GRAMS, COCAINE AND AIDING AND ABETTING (Ct 3: $2 MIL - 5 to 40 years; 4 years Supervised Release; S/A: $50.00)(3)
21:846 CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE, COCAINE (Ct 1: $2 MIL - 5 to 40 years; 4 years Supervised Release; S/A: $50.00)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 36 months; upon release Defendant placed on 5 years Supervised Release with the conditions that the Defendant follow the rules and regulations of the Probation Department, serve 250 hour s of community service with an agency and on a schedule agreed upon by the Defendant and the Probation Department, participate in a substance abuse program and is required to enroll in a program for batters; Deft to pay the Special Assessment in the amount of $50.00

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant remanded for 30 months on Count 2; upon release Defendant placed on 3 years supervised release with the conditions that Defendant serve 250 hours of community service with an agency and on a schedule agreed upon by the Defendant and the Pro bation Department, take vocational training and job placement, not possess nor own any firearms or dangerous weapons and is subject to random urinalysis. Special assessment in the amount of $50.00 to be paid within the 3 year period of supervise d release.
